ResearchProjectDef.label: EM-boost rounds
ResearchProjectDef.description: Utilize magnetic fields to accelerate the bullet upon firing, significantly increasing velocity and penetration.

ResearchProjectDef.label: phase-change cooling system
ResearchProjectDef.description: Integrate phase-change alloys that absorb heat through phase transition during high-temperature conditions, rapidly reducing the system's temperature, increasing rate of fire.

ResearchProjectDef.label: plasma acceleration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Combine electromagnetic force with plasma jet propulsion, enabling the bullet to reach extreme hypersonic speeds while reducing air resistance and thermal energy loss, significantly enhancing both range and velocity.

ResearchProjectDef.label: adaptive precision-controlled hypersonic rounds
ResearchProjectDef.description: Intelligent correction and energy regulation during flight can ensure precise targeting and effectively prevent excessive penetration, delivering the necessary harm to the target without passing through the back or causing excessive damage to the surrounding area.

ResearchProjectDef.label: //XuanMing//protocol
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft the ultra-tech persona heavy sniper rifle "Xuanming".

ResearchProjectDef.label: smart target analysis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Enable automatic locking onto the next priority target immediately after eliminating the current one. By utilizing multi-sensor fusion and AI algorithms, it rapidly evaluates target threat levels and positions, enabling seamless chain strikes and significantly enhancing combat efficiency.

ResearchProjectDef.label: trajectory correction
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft smart weapons firing bullets equipped with miniature sensors, control chips, and RCS, allowing them to sense the target's position in real time and adjust their trajectory for precise strikes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: energy convergence
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft directed Energy Weapons (DEWs), which are advanced systems that use focused energy in the form of lasers or particle beams to destroy targets. Unlike traditional kinetic weapons, DEWs operate by delivering energy directly to a target at the speed of light, offering rapid response times and high precision.

ResearchProjectDef.label: DEW tool
ResearchProjectDef.description: Based on the Schwartz-Lee lens focusing principle, a megawatt-class particle beam for industrial cutting has been developed. This technology enables millimeter-precision, non-explosive excavation of near-orbit celestial bodies and deep-planetary crust mineral veins, revolutionizing resource extraction methodologies.

ResearchProjectDef.label: heat dissipation module
ResearchProjectDef.description: During the laser weapon's operation, the emitted heat is converted into electrical energy using thermoelectric materials. This energy can be used to power other components of the weapon system or stored for later use, enhancing energy efficiency thus increasing rate of fire.

ResearchProjectDef.label: adaptive focusing Lens
ResearchProjectDef.description: Intelligent adaptive focusing lens dynamically adjust the laser beam's focal point and energy density based on the target's distance and material, allowing the energy to be precisely concentrated on the target's most vulnerable area, maximizing destructive power and penetration efficiency.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Anti-gravity Unit
ResearchProjectDef.description: Core module for universal floating platforms utilizing miniaturized anti-gravity field technology. Supports modular interfaces for production or combat payloads, enabling multi-role mission adaptability.\n\nWarning: Shared tactical datalink with operator may cause system overload during direct attacks, potentially leading to detonation. EMP pulses inflict catastrophic damage to control systems before protective upgrades.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Phased Anti-gravity Array
ResearchProjectDef.description: Multi-unit anti-gravity matrix with phase-synchronized control generates stable spherical force fields. Expanded payload capacity enables integration of heavy-caliber weapon systems, unlocking strategic-grade combat platforms.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hardware Overhaul
ResearchProjectDef.description: Installs EMP diversion modules and reinforced capacitor arrays. Significantly reduces EMP penetration damage while improving power conversion efficiency, drastically shortening recharge cycles and extending operational endurance.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Firmware Optimization
ResearchProjectDef.description: Deploys adaptive power management algorithms. Dynamically regulates thruster output and weapon cooling cycles to maximize combat efficiency per energy unit, achieving strategic extension of deployment duration.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bandwidth Expansion - Basic
ResearchProjectDef.description: Augments neural interface bandwidth to overcome single-operator limitations. +1 to maximum simultaneously controllable floating platforms.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bandwidth Expansion - Advanced
ResearchProjectDef.description: Upgrades quantum neural interface protocols for multi-target coordination. +1 to maximum simultaneously controllable floating platforms.
